description:
encoding/base32: add DecodeString and EncodeToString helper methods.

This makes encoding/base32 be consistent with encoding/base64.

messages.text:
This is technically an API change, but I think it's okay. Russ asked
me to apply the base64 newline fix to base32, which is how I came
across this. I believe it was simply an oversight that
DecodeString/EncodeToString weren't applied to both base32 and base64
at the same time.


Dave.
Want to add the newline changes here too?

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On Fri, Feb 3, 2012 at 11:43 AM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Want to add the newline changes here too?

I'd prefer to do it separately.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ff1def880707 ***

encoding/base32: add DecodeString and EncodeToString helper methods.

This makes encoding/base32 be consistent with encoding/base64.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5615053
